name: Shlok Jain
title: AI Engineer / Python AI Developer
summary: I am a Python AI Developer with hands-on experience in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Computer Vision. Proficient in frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and in building scalable REST APIs using FastAPI and Django. Currently exploring agentic AI frameworks like LangChain and CrewAI, along with generative AI models including DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, and LLaMA. Passionate about contributing to impactful AI-driven projects, with flexibility for both remote and onsite opportunities.
